title: Document
description:
The Document control is a widget that displays an SAP Document Service folder as an embedded element.
It is only available in web runtime.

Caption.description: The key name of the property.

IsVisible.description: Set the visibility of the control.

Separator.description: Set the visibility of the separator line below the control. This property takes precedence over `ControlSeparator` in section and is only supported for FormCell control in SectionedTable and not supported in FormCell Container.

Value.description: A repositoryId, rootFolderId or objectId which links to a unique folder of document service. If leave empty, a new folder will be created in document service instance.
